SELECT * FROM t_refund
store_id = #{storeId} and (refund_state = 'CHECKING' or refund_state = 'NOT_CONSENT')
and ( member_name like '%${searchKey}%' or goods_name like '%${searchKey}%')
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
create_time desc, refund_state asc

SELECT * FROM t_refund
store_id = #{storeId} and (refund_state = 'DELIVE' or refund_state = 'CONSENT' or refund_state = 'END')
and ( member_name like '%${searchKey}%' or goods_name like '%${searchKey}%')
and ( refund_type = #{refundType})
and ( refund_state = #{refundState})
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
create_time desc

SELECT * FROM t_refund
store_id = #{storeId} and refund_state = 'END'
and ( member_name like '%${searchKey}%' or goods_name like '%${searchKey}%')
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},
create_time desc

SELECT r.refund_id,r.order_id,r.order_out_trade_no,r.store_id,r.member_id,r.member_username,r.goods_id, r.goods_name,r.goods_num,r.refund_amount,r.goods_image,r.order_goods_type,r.refund_type,r.refund_state,r.is_lock, r.goods_state,r.create_time,r.seller_handle_time,r.admin_time,r.pics_info,r.buyer_message,r.seller_message, r.express_name,r.express_no,s.name FROM t_refund r,t_store s
r.store_id = s.store_id
( r.member_name like '%${searchKey}%' or r.goods_name like '%${searchKey}%')
order by
r.${orderColumn} ${orderType},
r.create_time desc, r.refund_state asc
